item.title: The Definitive Guide on How to Bootstrap Your Startup
item.description: You know the old expression, “Pull yourself up by your bootstraps?” It applies to your startup, too. Bootstrapping your startup means growing your business with little or no venture capital or outside investment. It means relying on your own savings and revenue to operate and expand.

item.title: Hugo is for lovers
item.description: This is the summary Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at installing hugo
